translated: Moreover, it is said that “without contact” and so on.

original: de mngon par 'du byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de mngon par 'du byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Its manifest compositional activity”

original: spyod lam la sogs pa mngon par 'du byed pa ste /🔽ci zhen lta ga la yod ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: spyod lam la sogs pa mngon par 'du byed pa ste / ci zhen lta ga la yod ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: refers to the manifest compositional activity of the sphere of discipline and so on.🔽What is that? How could it exist?

original: ga la yod ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ga la yod ces bya ba ni /
translated: “How could it exist?”

original: de'i tshe med pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i tshe med pa nyid de /
translated: means that it does not exist at that time.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de mngon sum du gyur pa'i dus na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de mngon sum du gyur pa'i dus na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means that when the meditative attainment of cessation is manifest.

original: gzhan yang 'di'i phyir yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di'i phyir yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, it is said that “for this reason also it is untenable.”

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to demonstrate this, it is said that “the nine serial absorptions” and so on.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The nine serial absorptions are

original: bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa brgyad dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa brgyad dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
translated: the eight meditative attainments of the formless realm and the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o //
analyzed: de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o //
translated: These are the nine serial meditative attainments.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dag ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dag ces bya ba ni /
translated: The eight liberations are

original: gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa brgyad dag go //
analyzed: gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa brgyad dag go //
translated: the eight beginning with “one who has form sees forms.”

original: de dag gi nang nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang 'byung ste /🔽'du shes dang / tshor ba @88a * //
analyzed: de dag gi nang nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang 'byung ste / 'du shes dang / tshor ba @88a * //
translated: Among them, the meditative attainment of cessation also occurs.🔽It is said that

original: 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te /
analyzed: 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te /
translated: the body makes manifest the cessation of ideation and feeling

original: rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and abides in its completion.🔽Moreover, this other explanation should be stated:

original: gzhan yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i snyoms par 'jug pa la brten nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan 'di yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i snyoms par 'jug pa la brten nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan 'di yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: “Based on the meditative attainment of the peak of cyclic existence and so on.”

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhung 'dis ni re zhig ji ltar 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon sum du byed pa de lta bu'i tshul ston te /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhung 'dis ni re zhig ji ltar 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon sum du byed pa de lta bu'i tshul ston te /
translated: This passage beginning with “the summit of existence” shows the method by which one realizes the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: phyis ni de'i dmigs pa dang / rnam pa ci zhig yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gal ba brjod do //
analyzed: phyis ni de'i dmigs pa dang / rnam pa ci zhig yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gal ba brjod do //
translated: Later, it will be shown that it is contradictory to say that it has an object and an aspect.

original: stobs kyi don ni rten nas kyi don du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs kyi don ni rten nas kyi don du rig par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of “power” should be understood as the meaning of “basis.”

original: tshul 'di gnyis ji skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lung gis grub bo //
analyzed: tshul 'di gnyis ji skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lung gis grub bo //
translated: These two methods are established by the scriptural passage beginning with “as it is said.”

original: mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “sphere of signlessness”

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: means the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dir don gcig tu rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dir don gcig tu rig par bya'o //
translated: Cause and condition should be understood as having the same meaning here.

original: yang na rgyu nye ba ni rkyen no//
analyzed: yang na rgyu nye ba ni rkyen no//
translated: Or, a proximate cause is a condition.

original: rgyu ni brgyud pa gzhan dag kyang yin no //
analyzed: rgyu ni brgyud pa gzhan dag kyang yin no //
translated: A cause is also a remote cause.

original: yid la mi byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: yid la mi byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa med pa'o //
translated: “Non-attention” means non-engagement.

original: ji ltar dge ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni dge ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji ltar dge ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni dge ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: How could it be unwholesome? means it is wholesome alone.

original: gal te de dge ba kho na yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: gal te de dge ba kho na yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that it is wholesome alone,

original: de'i phyir / dge ba yin na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / dge ba yin na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: then he says, Even if it is wholesome, etc.

original: 'dir yang ji ltar zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang ji ltar zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Here also, the word how is to be supplied.

original: gal te 'di yang 'dod pa nyid yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: gal te 'di yang 'dod pa nyid yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that this is just what is intended,

original: de'i phyir / mtshungs par ldan na yang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / mtshungs par ldan na yang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: then he says, Even if it is associated, etc.

original: 'di yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: This also is to be supplied as before.

original: gal te 'gog pa la dmigs pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa ma yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: gal te 'gog pa la dmigs pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa ma yin du zin kyang /
translated: If you think that even if it does not have the aspect of cessation and the aspect of peace,

original: de'i dmigs pa dang / rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur mod ce na /
analyzed: de'i dmigs pa dang / rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur mod ce na /
translated: its object and aspect are different,

original: de'i phyir / 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: then he says, But if it is not, etc.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba 'dis ni sems g-yengs bar rung zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba 'dis ni sems g-yengs bar rung zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The word how is to be supplied with the phrase it is possible that the mind is distracted.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i dmigs pa dang / rnam pa gzhan zhig yin no /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i dmigs pa dang / rnam pa gzhan zhig yin no /
translated: The concentration of the mind on the signless is a different object and aspect.

original: sbyor ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su g-yeng bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su g-yeng bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Immediately after the preparatory mind, there is distraction.

original: des na mtshan ma med pa ni sbyor ba dang mthun pa'i phyir rkyen gnyis te zhes bya ba 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des na mtshan ma med pa ni sbyor ba dang mthun pa'i phyir rkyen gnyis te zhes bya ba 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is taught that this contradicts the statement that the signless is a condition for two, because it is compatible with preparation.

original: de ltar na re zhig lung @88b du ma bstan pa rnam pa bzhi rgya cher mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig lung @88b du ma bstan pa rnam pa bzhi rgya cher mi 'thad do //
translated: Thus, the four neutral states are not reasonable in any way.

original: gal te 'dir gzhan dag 'on te lung du ma bstan pa gzhan zhig tu 'gyur mod ces zer du dogs nas /
analyzed: gal te 'dir gzhan dag 'on te lung du ma bstan pa gzhan zhig tu 'gyur mod ces zer du dogs nas /
translated: If one were to ask, “Are the neutral states other than these?”

original: gnyis po de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gnyis po de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: in order to respond, “No, they are not other,” he says, “because of just those two,” and so on.

original: gnyis po de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnyis po de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Because of just those two” means

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang / srid pa'i rtse mo'i snyoms par 'jug pa la brten nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang / srid pa'i rtse mo'i snyoms par 'jug pa la brten nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: because it is said, “the nine serial absorptions,” and because it is said, “in dependence on the meditative attainment of the summit of existence.”

original: de ltar gzhan gyi phyogs rgya cher bsal nas /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan gyi phyogs rgya cher bsal nas /
translated: Having thus extensively refuted the position of others,

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pas mjug bsdu ba mdzad do /🔽// / bam po gsum pa /🔽'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /🔽gzhan dag slob dpon la zhu ba byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pas mjug bsdu ba mdzad do / // / bam po gsum pa / 'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / gzhan dag slob dpon la zhu ba byed pa yin te /
translated: the conclusion is drawn with “Therefore…”🔽Objection: If the meditative attainment of cessation

original: gal te 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sems dang bcas par mi 'thad na /
analyzed: gal te 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sems dang bcas par mi 'thad na /
translated: is not tenable as a mind possessing mental consciousness,🔽then you must explain how it possesses mind.

original: kye khyod kyis kyang de sems dang bcas pa ji lta bu yin par brjod dgos so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: kye khyod kyis kyang de sems dang bcas pa ji lta bu yin par brjod dgos so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that you must explain how it is that it possesses mind.

original: 'dis gdon mi za bar gnyer gsad dgos sam /
analyzed: 'dis gdon mi za bar gnyer gsad dgos sam /
translated: Is it necessary to kill the cat?

original: ci na gang gis na de skad du zhu bar byed /
analyzed: ci na gang gis na de skad du zhu bar byed /
translated: Why is it asked in this way?

original: 'di ltar slob dpon gyis ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar slob dpon gyis ni /
translated: For the master has said:

original: de sems dang bcas par gsungs pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: de sems dang bcas par gsungs pa med do zhe na /
translated: But it is not said that it is endowed with mind.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: slob dpon gyis kyang lung gi tshad mas zhal gyis bzhes pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis kyang lung gi tshad mas zhal gyis bzhes pa kho na yin te /
translated: The Master also accepts it as valid scripture,

original: rnam par shes pa lus dang ma bral ba yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa lus dang ma bral ba yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is said that consciousness is not separate from the body.

original: de lta bas na de ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na de ni gyi na'o //
translated: Therefore, that is not the case.

original: ji ltar mdo sde pa kha cig 'dod pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ji ltar mdo sde pa kha cig 'dod pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Like some Sautrantikas

original: de lta bur sems dang bcas par 'dod do zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de lta bur sems dang bcas par 'dod do zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: This is the remainder of the sentence: “They assert it to be endowed with mind in that way.”

original: 'dis ni slob dpon bzhed pa'i phyogs ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni slob dpon bzhed pa'i phyogs ston to //
translated: This shows the position accepted by the Master.

original: kha cig pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i khyad par rnam par 'byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs la sems pa de dag yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: kha cig pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i khyad par rnam par 'byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs la sems pa de dag yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Some means those who think about the first differentiation of phenomena, the Dharmasamgiti.🔽Some Sautrantikas

original: mdo sde pa kha cig ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba ni gzhan dag go //
analyzed: mdo sde pa kha cig ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba ni gzhan dag go //
translated: Others say:

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba ni slob dpon no //🔽rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba ni slob dpon no // rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The master [Vasubandhu] states:

original: rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽sa bon thams cad pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa'o // sa bon thams cad pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The so-called “maturation consciousness” is the consciousness that is called “maturation.”

original: dge ba la sogs pa'i chos bskyed nus pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba la sogs pa'i chos bskyed nus pa'o //
translated: The so-called “containing all seeds” is the ability to produce virtuous and so on dharmas.

original: nyid mtshams sbyor ba nas bzung ste @89a * //
analyzed: nyid mtshams sbyor ba nas bzung ste @89a * //
translated: From the moment of linking up

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: ma'i rum du nyid mtshams sbyor ba khu ba dang / khrag brdos par rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa myos pa de nas bzung ste zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ma'i rum du nyid mtshams sbyor ba khu ba dang / khrag brdos par rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa myos pa de nas bzung ste zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: from the moment the consciousness that is the maturation of the karmic act, which is confused, links up with the semen and blood in the mother’s womb.

original: skye ba de dang der zhes bya ba ni mi la sogs par ro //
analyzed: skye ba de dang der zhes bya ba ni mi la sogs par ro //
translated: In that and that birth means in the birth of a human and so on.

original: bar chad med pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bar chad med pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Without interruption means

original: rnam par chad pa med par sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam par chad pa med par sbyar ro //
translated: without a break.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu tha dad pas tha dad par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu tha dad pas tha dad par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because the causes of maturation are different, they become different means

original: dge ba la sogs pa tha dad pas tha dad pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽mya ngan las 'das pa la thug gi bar du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge ba la sogs pa tha dad pas tha dad pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // mya ngan las 'das pa la thug gi bar du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of “different” is that they are different because of being virtuous and so on.🔽Up to the end of nirvana means up to the end of nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin pa ste mya ngan las 'das pa zad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin pa ste mya ngan las 'das pa zad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of “the end of nirvana” is the exhaustion of nirvana.

original: rgyun gyis 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun gyis so //
analyzed: rgyun gyis 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun gyis so //
translated: The meaning of “continuously engaged” is that it is engaged continuously.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par shes pa bshad ma thag pa de lta bu de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par shes pa bshad ma thag pa de lta bu de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: That means the just-explained consciousness that has the nature of karmic maturation and so on.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe'o //
translated: At that time means at the time of the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: mi 'chad de zhes bya ba ni mi 'bral zhing mi 'gag ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mi 'chad de zhes bya ba ni mi 'bral zhing mi 'gag ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not severed means it is not separated and does not cease.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa mi 'thad pas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa mi 'thad pas so //
translated: Because of that means because consciousness is untenable.

original: sems dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sems dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Endowed with mind” means “endowed with consciousness.”

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po gzhan dag ni mi 'jug ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po gzhan dag ni mi 'jug ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The other groups of six consciousnesses do not operate.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa'i tshogs rnams so //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa'i tshogs rnams so //
translated: The other groups of consciousnesses are different from the consciousness that is retribution.

original: ci'i phyir mi 'jug ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi 'jug ce na /
translated: Why do they not operate?

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa de dag gis bon nyams pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa de dag gis bon nyams pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “because the seeds of those consciousnesses are damaged.”

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i nus pa nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i nus pa nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the power of visual consciousness, etc., is damaged.

original: gang gis sa bon nyams par byas she na /
analyzed: gang gis sa bon nyams par byas she na /
translated: By what is the seed damaged?

original: de'i phyir / 'gog pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'gog pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore it is said, “by the samādhi of cessation,” etc.

original: 'jug pa'i sems kyi zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i sems su rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i sems kyi zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i sems su rig par bya ste /
translated: “The mind that is engaged” should be understood as the mind of application.

original: gang gis na de mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis na de mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: By what is it made manifest?

original: dus ji srid cig tu nyams she na /
analyzed: dus ji srid cig tu nyams she na /
translated: For how long is it damaged?

original: de'i phyir / dus re zhig ces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / dus re zhig ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Therefore it is said, “for a period of time.”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore means

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa chang pas so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa chang pas so //
translated: because of the eye consciousness, etc.

original: 'o na rnam par shes pa'i sems yod bzhin du yang ji ltar de'i gnas skabs sems med pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rnam par shes pa'i sems yod bzhin du yang ji ltar de'i gnas skabs sems med pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Now, if consciousness exists, how can there be a state of mindlessness?

original: zhes gzhan @89b gyis glan ka 'byung du dogs nas /
analyzed: zhes gzhan @89b gyis glan ka 'byung du dogs nas /
translated: Fearing that this might be a source of error for others,

original: sems ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /🔽gcig ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / gcig ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: he says, Mind is twofold, etc.🔽One is

original: 'di ni re zhig gcig yin te'o //
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig gcig yin te'o //
translated: this is the first.

original: de'i sa bon rnams zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i sa bon rnams zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Its seeds

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams so //
translated: the seeds of the eye consciousness, etc.🔽Accumulated

original: bstsags pa zhes bya ba ni kun tu bstsags pa ste /
analyzed: bstsags pa zhes bya ba ni kun tu bstsags pa ste /
translated: means completely accumulated.

original: nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na bstsags pa'i phyir sems yin no //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na bstsags pa'i phyir sems yin no //
translated: In the manner of etymological definitions, it is mind because it accumulates.

original: gnyis pa ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The second

original: 'di ni gzhan yin te'o //🔽sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan yin te'o // sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: this is the other.🔽Various

original: rnam par sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam par sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: means of various kinds.

original: gang gis sna tshogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis sna tshogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked by what it is various,

original: de'i phyir de'i dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: therefore it is said, “its object, etc.”

original: de la dmigs pa rnam pa tha dad pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa rnam pa tha dad pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: There, the various aspects of the object are form, etc.

original: rnam par rnams tha dad pa ni gzugs la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi sngon po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rnams tha dad pa ni gzugs la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi sngon po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The various aspects are those of form, etc., such as blue, etc.

original: bye brag tha dad pa ni sngon po la sogs pa de dag gi nang gi bye brag ste /
analyzed: bye brag tha dad pa ni sngon po la sogs pa de dag gi nang gi bye brag ste /
translated: The various distinctions are the internal distinctions of those blue, etc.,

original: rma bya'i mgrin pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rma bya'i mgrin pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: such as the neck of a peacock, etc.

original: de nyid kyi tshul gyis na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshul gyis na /
translated: By that method,

original: sna tshogs pa'i phyir sems yin no //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i phyir sems yin no //
translated: the mind is various.

original: 'dis ni re zhig sems kho na rnam par dbye bar zad do //
analyzed: 'dis ni re zhig sems kho na rnam par dbye bar zad do //
translated: This is the analysis of the mind alone for the time being.

original: da ni sems gnyis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni sems gnyis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs pa yin no //
translated: Now, the reply is given by “a second mind, etc.”

original: dpe ni go bar sla'o //🔽gal te dus re zhig sa bon nyams pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dpe ni go bar sla'o // gal te dus re zhig sa bon nyams pa'i phyir /
translated: The example is easy to understand.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa mi 'byung na /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa mi 'byung na /
translated: If, for a time, the eye consciousness, etc., do not arise because the seed is damaged,🔽then

original: phyis rnal 'byor pa langs pa na yang de'i rnam par shes pa de ji ltar 'byung snyam du gzhan de ltar sems par thugs su chud nas /
analyzed: phyis rnal 'byor pa langs pa na yang de'i rnam par shes pa de ji ltar 'byung snyam du gzhan de ltar sems par thugs su chud nas /
translated: And when the yogi rises later, how does that consciousness arise?

original: sa bon nyams pa'i gnas skabs de zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
analyzed: sa bon nyams pa'i gnas skabs de zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
translated: Understanding that others think in this way, he says, At the time of the seed's destruction... and so on extensively.

original: zhan pa dang / ches zhan pa dang / zhes bya ba ni zhan pa dang / ches zhan pa dang / shin tu ches zhan pa'i rim gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhan pa dang / ches zhan pa dang / zhes bya ba ni zhan pa dang / ches zhan pa dang / shin tu ches zhan pa'i rim gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Weak, weaker, and weakest means in the order of weak, weaker, and weakest.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir / chu tshan dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / chu tshan dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, he says like a hot river... and so on.

original: 'bri ba'i tshul gyis sgra ni chu tshan 'bri ba'i tshul dang / mda' 'phangs pa'i shugs 'bri ba'i tshul du zhes re re la sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'bri ba'i tshul gyis sgra ni chu tshan 'bri ba'i tshul dang / mda' 'phangs pa'i shugs 'bri ba'i tshul du zhes re re la sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The word like should be applied to each, meaning like the way a hot river diminishes and like the way the force of a shot arrow diminishes.

original: ji ltar chu tshan dang / mda' 'phangs pa'i shugs zhan pa dang / ches zhan pa dang / shin tu ches zhan pa'i rim pas @90a * //
analyzed: ji ltar chu tshan dang / mda' 'phangs pa'i shugs zhan pa dang / ches zhan pa dang / shin tu ches zhan pa'i rim pas @90a * //
translated: Just as a hot river and the force of a shot arrow diminish in the order of weak, weaker, and weakest,

original: 'bri ba ltar de yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'bri ba ltar de yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is just as it is written.🔽By that, means by the sequence of weak, weaker, and weakest.

original: des zhes bya ba ni zhan pa dang / ches zhan pa dang / shin tu ches zhan pa'i rim pas so / ldang ba'i dus 'phangs pa'i mthar thug pa na /
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni zhan pa dang / ches zhan pa dang / shin tu ches zhan pa'i rim pas so / ldang ba'i dus 'phangs pa'i mthar thug pa na /
translated: The time of rising is the limit of the projection.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis ni gnas skabs de nyid khyad par du byed do ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis ni gnas skabs de nyid khyad par du byed do ;
translated: This shows the distinction of that very occasion.

original: /'phangs pa'i zhes bya ba ni bdag gis dus 'di srid cig tu snyoms par zhugs pas gnas par bya'o snyam pa rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi shugs so //
analyzed: /'phangs pa'i zhes bya ba ni bdag gis dus 'di srid cig tu snyoms par zhugs pas gnas par bya'o snyam pa rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi shugs so //
translated: The projection is the force of the yogi's mind, thinking, I will remain in this meditative equipoise for this long.

original: de'i mthar ni rdzogs pa ste der thug cing phyin pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i mthar ni rdzogs pa ste der thug cing phyin pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The end of that is the completion, the limit of that, the arrival at that. That is what is meant by the time of rising is the limit of the projection.

original: skad cig re re la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skad cig re re la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In each moment means

original: skad cig skad cig la'o //
analyzed: skad cig skad cig la'o //
translated: in each moment.

original: 'gyur ba'i khyad par las zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'gyur ba'i khyad par las zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From the distinction of change means

original: rgyu'i skad cig dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid 'bras bu mi 'dra ba 'byung ba las zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyu'i skad cig dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid 'bras bu mi 'dra ba 'byung ba las zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of the statement “from the arising of a different effect that has characteristics incompatible with the momentariness of the cause” is that the effect arises from the cause.

original: 'jug pa rnyed pas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'jug pa rnyed pas zhes bya ba la /
translated: “By the attainment of engagement” means

original: 'jug pa rnyed pa ni gang gis yongs su brtas pa de ni 'jug pa rnyed pa ste des so //
analyzed: 'jug pa rnyed pa ni gang gis yongs su brtas pa de ni 'jug pa rnyed pa ste des so //
translated: that that which is fully developed by the attainment of engagement is the attainment of engagement, and it is by that.

original: de ci zhe na /
analyzed: de ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: de'i phyir / sa bon zhes bya ba gsung so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / sa bon zhes bya ba gsung so //
translated: Therefore, he says, “the seed.”

original: rkyen ji ltar ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rkyen ji ltar ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “In accordance with the conditions” means

original: gang gi rkyen dag gang yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang gi rkyen dag gang yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: that which is the conditions of that.

original: gzhan dag kyang zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Other” means the eye consciousness and so on, which are other than the mental consciousness.

original: de ltar dang po'i khyad par rnam par 'byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs la sems pa'i mdo sde pa de dag gi sems dang bcas par 'dod pa rgya cher bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: de ltar dang po'i khyad par rnam par 'byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs la sems pa'i mdo sde pa de dag gi sems dang bcas par 'dod pa rgya cher bsgrubs nas /
translated: Thus, having extensively established the assertion of the Sautrāntikas, who are called the Differentiators of the First, that the mind exists,

original: de ni rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa de nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa de nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the establishment of that very consciousness as the ripening of karma, he says:

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
translated: “The consciousness that is the ripening of karma” and so on extensively.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the consciousness that is the ripening of karma?

original: bsgo bar byed do zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro //🔽sa bon rnam pa sna tshogs khong na yod pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni de'i rang bzhin bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgo bar byed do zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro // sa bon rnam pa sna tshogs khong na yod pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni de'i rang bzhin bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is connected to the phrase “it is what is sown.”🔽“It is the storehouse of the seeds of the various phenomena” indicates its nature.

original: gang la sa bon rnam pa sna tshogs khong na yod cing lus yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang la sa bon rnam pa sna tshogs khong na yod cing lus yod pa de la de skad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is called that because it is the place where the seeds of the various phenomena are stored and the body is sustained.

original: gang gis de la bsgo bar byed ce na /
analyzed: gang gis de la bsgo bar byed ce na /
translated: By what is it sown?

original: de'i phyir / de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore he says, “It is sown by the other consciousnesses.”

original: de las gzhan pa'i @90b rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i zhes ba ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'byung pa'i'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i @90b rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i zhes ba ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'byung pa'i'o //
translated: Other than that, it is that which arises simultaneously with consciousness.

original: chos gzhan zhes bya ba ni dag pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos gzhan zhes bya ba ni dag pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
translated: Other phenomena are the pure and the attachment, etc.

original: ji ltar bsgo bar byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar bsgo bar byed ce na /
translated: How does it cause them to be?

original: de'i phyir / sa bon brtas par byed pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / sa bon brtas par byed pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “by way of nourishing the seeds.”

original: sa bon gso bar byed pa'i sgo nas yin gyi /🔽sngon med pa skyed pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sa bon gso bar byed pa'i sgo nas yin gyi / sngon med pa skyed pas ni ma yin te /
translated: It is by way of nourishing the seeds,🔽not by way of generating what did not previously exist.

original: ji skad sngar bshad pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji skad sngar bshad pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is as explained above.

original: ji ltar rigs par zhes bya ba ni ji ltar srid par ro //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs par zhes bya ba ni ji ltar srid par ro //
translated: As is appropriate means as is possible.

original: stobs ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o //🔽bag chags 'jug pa rnyed na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: stobs ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o // bag chags 'jug pa rnyed na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As is the power means as is the ability.🔽When the entry of the latent afflictions is obtained means

original: bag chags brtas na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bag chags brtas na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: when the latent afflictions are nourished.

original: de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: With reference to that very consciousness means

original: gnas brtan rta skad kyis /
analyzed: gnas brtan rta skad kyis /
translated: the elder Aśvaghoṣa

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas /🔽tshigs su bcad de bshad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste ;
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas / tshigs su bcad de bshad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste ;
translated: with reference to that very consciousness as retribution🔽he explains in verse.

original: 'dis ni skyes bu tshad mas bshad par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni skyes bu tshad mas bshad par ston to //
translated: This shows that the person is explained by means of valid cognition.

original: sems 'di zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems 'di zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This mind

original: sems de yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems de yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: means that mind should be understood.

original: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of distinction does it possess?

original: de'i phyir / sa bon mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / sa bon mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said to possess infinite seeds.

original: dge ba la sogs pa'i chos kyi sa bon dpag tu med pa dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽'dis kyang bstsags pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: dge ba la sogs pa'i chos kyi sa bon dpag tu med pa dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // 'dis kyang bstsags pa'i phyir na /
translated: It is said to be connected with immeasurable seeds of virtuous and nonvirtuous dharmas.

original: sems zhes bya ba la bstan te /
analyzed: sems zhes bya ba la bstan te /
translated: This also shows that it is called mind because it accumulates.

original: bag chags bstsags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bag chags bstsags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is called mind because it accumulates latent impressions.🔽It is said to flow on in a stream

original: rgyun gyis 'jug 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyun gyis 'jug 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: de yang rgyun gyis 'jug pa'o ;
analyzed: de yang rgyun gyis 'jug pa'o ;
translated: and that is by its continuity.

original: / de dang de'i sa bon brtas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: / de dang de'i sa bon brtas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The seed of that and that is nourished” means

original: chos de dang de 'byung ba'i rgyu bag chags zhes bya ba sa bon thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: chos de dang de 'byung ba'i rgyu bag chags zhes bya ba sa bon thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'o //
translated: the cause of the arising of that and that phenomenon is the latent impressions called “seeds,” which have been operating since beginningless time.

original: brtas pa ni gsos pa'o //
analyzed: brtas pa ni gsos pa'o //
translated: “Nourished” means “developed.”

original: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “It becomes” means “it goes.”

original: gang zhig yod na de brtas par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig yod na de brtas par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it exists, by what is it nourished?

original: de'i phyir / sems la rang rkyen byung na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / sems la rang rkyen byung na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “When the mind’s own conditions arise.”

original: sems la dad pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rkyen kun tu byung na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems la dad pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rkyen kun tu byung na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that when the conditions of faith, desire, and so on in the mind arise.

original: de brtas zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa de yongs su brtas na'o //🔽rim gyis 'jug @91a * //
analyzed: de brtas zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa de yongs su brtas na'o // rim gyis 'jug @91a * //
translated: “It becomes nourished” means that when that consciousness as retribution is nourished.

original: pa rnyed na dus su 'bras bu 'byin pa 'grub ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: pa rnyed na dus su 'bras bu 'byin pa 'grub ces bya ba ni /
translated: “If it is obtained through gradual engagement, the result is accomplished in time.”

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa gang gis rim gyis 'jug pa rnyed na 'bras bu yang 'byin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa gang gis rim gyis 'jug pa rnyed na 'bras bu yang 'byin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That consciousness which is the result of evolution, which is the basis of the other evolving consciousnesses, and which is the cause of their evolving, is called the store-consciousness.

original: dus su zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o //
analyzed: dus su zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o //
translated: In time means at another time.

original: ci 'dra bar 'grub ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra bar 'grub ce na /
translated: What kind of result is produced?

original: de'i phyir / ma du lung ga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / ma du lung ga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “like the color of a mango fruit. ”

original: de'i sha zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i sha zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The flesh of that means

original: ma du lung ga'i nang gi sha la'o //
analyzed: ma du lung ga'i nang gi sha la'o //
translated: the flesh inside the mango.

original: ci zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: tshon de'i rim gyis 'jug pa rnyed nas dus su 'bras bu 'byin pa 'grub ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: tshon de'i rim gyis 'jug pa rnyed nas dus su 'bras bu 'byin pa 'grub ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The result is produced in time, after the color of that fruit is obtained.

original: de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: The Blessed One has also taught that very thing, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes par de bstan pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba de bstan to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes par de bstan pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba de bstan to //
translated: The Blessed One has also taught that very store-consciousness by other names, in other times, for the sake of those disciples whose dispositions are still immature.

original: len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni brda phrad par zad do //
analyzed: len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni brda phrad par zad do //
translated: The meaning of the verse beginning with the words, “the appropriating consciousness, etc. ” is self-evident.

original: da ni de yang yang srid par zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: da ni de yang yang srid par zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: Now, as for the statement “that is also called the appropriating consciousness,” etc.,

original: len pa'i rnam par shes pa de'i ming gi rnam grangs rnams bstan to //
analyzed: len pa'i rnam par shes pa de'i ming gi rnam grangs rnams bstan to //
translated: it shows the synonyms for the appropriating consciousness.

original: lus nye bar len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lus nye bar len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Because it appropriates a body” means

original: lus rang gir byed pa'i phyir ro //🔽len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dis len par byed pas na len pa'o //
analyzed: lus rang gir byed pa'i phyir ro // len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dis len par byed pas na len pa'o //
translated: because it makes the body its own.

original: de ni len pa yang yin la rnam par shes pa yang yin pas len pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni len pa yang yin la rnam par shes pa yang yin pas len pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: “It is called the appropriating consciousness” means that it appropriates, and it is consciousness, hence it is the appropriating consciousness.

original: gzhir gyur pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhir gyur pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because it is the foundation” means because it is the support.

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The consciousness that is the foundation of all

original: 'dir chos thams cad kun tu sbyor bar byed pas kun gzhi ste /
analyzed: 'dir chos thams cad kun tu sbyor bar byed pas kun gzhi ste /
translated: Here, the foundation is that which connects all things.

original: tshig bsdu ba ni snga ma bzhin no //🔽rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshig bsdu ba ni snga ma bzhin no // rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The compound is to be resolved as above.🔽The consciousness that is the result of evolution

original: rnam par smin pas rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par smin pas rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: is the result of evolution.

original: 'dir yang tshig bsdu ba ni snga ma kho na dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang tshig bsdu ba ni snga ma kho na dang 'dra'o //
translated: Here also, the condensation of the words is the same as before.

original: lung gis rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa rab tu bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: lung gis rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa rab tu bsgrubs nas /
translated: Having established the fruitional consciousness by means of scripture,

original: da ni rigs pas kyang de 'grub par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rigs pas kyang de 'grub par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to demonstrate its establishment by means of reasoning,

original: gal te de yang mi 'dod na //
analyzed: gal te de yang mi 'dod na //
translated: he says, “If you do not accept even that,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: ” and so on.

original: de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽mi gtong bar 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'o // mi gtong bar 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Consciousness other than that” is the visual consciousness and so on.

original: yongs su ma btang bar 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su ma btang bar 'dug pa'o //
translated: “It would not be relinquished” means it would not be abandoned.

original: khyab par bya ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: khyab par bya ba ci zhe na /
translated: What is it that it pervades?

original: 'dug pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: 'dug pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The phrase “it would not be relinquished” is to be applied here.

original: @91b mig la sogs pa'i rten nyi tshe la 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @91b mig la sogs pa'i rten nyi tshe la 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would be present only in the support of the eye and so on.

original: 'di skad du lus ni rnam par shes pas zin pa'i phyir ma shi'i bar du rul bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di skad du lus ni rnam par shes pas zin pa'i phyir ma shi'i bar du rul bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This is what is being said: As long as the body is not dead, it does not decay because it is appropriated by consciousness.

original: de ni gal te de la rnam par shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'am /
analyzed: de ni gal te de la rnam par shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'am /
translated: If that consciousness were not continuous or pervasive,

original: khyab par 'dug na /
analyzed: khyab par 'dug na /
translated: then

original: de lta na zin pa yin na /
analyzed: de lta na zin pa yin na /
translated: If that were so,

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa las ma gtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa gzhan la ni ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa yang mi srid do //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa las ma gtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa gzhan la ni ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa yang mi srid do //
translated: then consciousness other than the fruitional consciousness would not be possible, as explained above.

original: de bas na de dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na de dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is free from that,

original: shi ba'i ro bzhin du rul bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: shi ba'i ro bzhin du rul bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: it would be like a dead corpse and would rot.

original: de lta yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: de bas na gang gi dbang gis 'drul bar mi 'gyur ba de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na gang gi dbang gis 'drul bar mi 'gyur ba de bas na /
translated: Therefore, because of that,

original: gdon mi za bar rnam par shes pa gzhan yod par khas blang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar rnam par shes pa gzhan yod par khas blang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: it is taught that without a doubt another consciousness must be accepted.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang las 'bras bu mi 'byung ba 'grub par byed pa de ni de dang tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang las 'bras bu mi 'byung ba 'grub par byed pa de ni de dang tha dad pa yin te /
translated: The syllogism is: That which does not produce an effect from something is different from it,

original: dper na snam bu las chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ba bum pas 'grub par byed pa lta bu yin la /
analyzed: dper na snam bu las chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ba bum pas 'grub par byed pa lta bu yin la /
translated: like a pot, which does not produce an effect such as holding water, which is produced by a cloth.

original: de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa las 'bras bu lus mi 'drul ba la sogs pa mi 'byung ba la yang rnam par shes pas 'grub par byed do //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa las 'bras bu lus mi 'drul ba la sogs pa mi 'byung ba la yang rnam par shes pas 'grub par byed do //
translated: And the consciousness that is different from that does not produce the effect of the body, etc.

original: tha dad pa ni de las 'bras bu mi 'byung ba 'grub par byed pa tsam gyis yod pa yin pas /
analyzed: tha dad pa ni de las 'bras bu mi 'byung ba 'grub par byed pa tsam gyis yod pa yin pas /
translated: The difference is established by the mere fact that the effect does not occur.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is a reason based on the nature of things.

original: gal te de yang mi 'dod na nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal ba gang la gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa gzhan 'di yang brjod dgos so //
analyzed: gal te de yang mi 'dod na nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal ba gang la gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa gzhan 'di yang brjod dgos so //
translated: If that is not accepted, then it must be said that the latent impressions of the afflictions reside somewhere, etc.

original: gang la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa gang la rnam par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽de'i gnyen pos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa gang la rnam par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de'i gnyen pos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Reside somewhere means reside in some consciousness.

original: bag la nyal gyi gnyen po 'phags pa'i lam gyis so //
analyzed: bag la nyal gyi gnyen po 'phags pa'i lam gyis so //
translated: By the antidote to that means by the noble path, which is the antidote to the latent impressions.

original: re zhig rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po rnams ni phyi rol du rnam par g-yengs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: re zhig rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po rnams ni phyi rol du rnam par g-yengs pa'i phyir /
translated: The five collections of consciousness are distracted externally.

original: de'i tshe mi srid pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na 'dus la /
analyzed: de'i tshe mi srid pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na 'dus la /
translated: At that time, it is impossible, so only the mental consciousness is included.

original: de yang bag la nyal gyi gnyen por gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang bag la nyal gyi gnyen por gyur pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, it becomes the antidote to the latent afflictions.

original: de'i phyir bag la nyal gang la gnas pa spong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i phyir bag la nyal gang la gnas pa spong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the latent afflictions that abide there are abandoned.

original: ci ste gzhan dag de ni gnyen po'i sems la gnas pa nyid spong bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems su dogs nas /
analyzed: ci ste gzhan dag de ni gnyen po'i sems la gnas pa nyid spong bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems su dogs nas /
translated: If others suspect that the latent afflictions are abandoned by abiding in the antidote mind,

original: de'i phyir / gal te zhes @92a * //🔽bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gal te zhes @92a * // bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: therefore it is said if and so on.

original: 'di skad du 'phags pa'i lam ni bag chags dpyis dbyung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin na /
analyzed: 'di skad du 'phags pa'i lam ni bag chags dpyis dbyung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin na /
translated: This is stated: If the noble path were engaged for the complete eradication of the latent afflictions,

original: ji ltar na gang gis na gzhir 'gyur bar de de dang mthun par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar na gang gis na gzhir 'gyur bar de de dang mthun par 'gyur te /
translated: how could it be compatible with them, by which it would become their basis?

original: gang zhig gang gzhom par brtson pa de nyid de la phan 'dogs par byed pa ni mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gzhom par brtson pa de nyid de la phan 'dogs par byed pa ni mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: It is taught that it is not suitable for that which strives to conquer something to assist it.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang 'joms par byed pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang 'joms par byed pa de ni /
translated: As for the application, that which conquers something

original: de skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not a producer,

original: dper na chu dang / me lta bu yin la /
analyzed: dper na chu dang / me lta bu yin la /
translated: like water and fire, for example.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yang bag chags 'joms par byed pa yin pas /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yang bag chags 'joms par byed pa yin pas /
translated: And the ārya path is what destroys the latent afflictions.

original: khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, there is the observation of the contradiction of the pervader.

original: 'di ltar 'joms par byed pa dang / 'joms par byed pa ma yin pa nyid gnyis kyis ni phan tshun spangs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'joms par byed pa dang / 'joms par byed pa ma yin pa nyid gnyis kyis ni phan tshun spangs te /
translated: Thus, the two, being a destroyer and not being a destroyer, are mutually exclusive,

original: gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba yin la /
translated: because they are contradictory in the sense of being mutually exclusive.

original: 'joms par byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ni skyed par byed pa nyid la khyab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'joms par byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ni skyed par byed pa nyid la khyab pa'i phyir /
translated: And because not being a destroyer pervades being a producer,

original: de dang 'gal ba 'joms par byed pa nyid dmigs na /
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba 'joms par byed pa nyid dmigs na /
translated: when the contradiction of that, being a destroyer, is observed,

original: 'joms par byed pa ma yin pa nyid ldog go //
analyzed: 'joms par byed pa ma yin pa nyid ldog go //
translated: not being a destroyer is overturned.

original: de log na des khyab par bya ba skyed par byed pa nyid kyang ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de log na des khyab par bya ba skyed par byed pa nyid kyang ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: When that is overturned, that which it pervades, being a producer, is also overturned.

original: de bas na rnam par shes pa gzhir gyur pa gzhan zhig gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na rnam par shes pa gzhir gyur pa gzhan zhig gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is certain that another consciousness that is the basis must be accepted.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang yod na 'byung ba de ni sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang yod na 'byung ba de ni sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
translated: The application is this: that which occurs when something exists is the antecedent of that.

original: dper na sa bon yod na myu gu 'byung ba lta bu yin la /
analyzed: dper na sa bon yod na myu gu 'byung ba lta bu yin la /
translated: For example, when a seed exists, a sprout occurs.

original: rnam par shes pa gzhan yod na yang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gzhan yod na yang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags 'byung ba yin no //
translated: And when another consciousness exists, the latent afflictions occur.

original: de sngon du 'gro ba can dang ni de yod na 'byung ba tsam dang 'brel pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de sngon du 'gro ba can dang ni de yod na 'byung ba tsam dang 'brel pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is related to the mere occurrence of that as its antecedent,

original: de yod pa kho nas yod pa yin pas /
analyzed: de yod pa kho nas yod pa yin pas /
translated: it exists only when that exists.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is a natural reason.

original: gzhan yang gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Moreover, it is said, “One born in the formless realm,” and so on.

original: gang dag la sems kyi rgyud nyon mongs pa can dang / dge ba dang / zag pa med pa yod pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang dag la sems kyi rgyud nyon mongs pa can dang / dge ba dang / zag pa med pa yod pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Those who have a mindstream that is afflicted, virtuous, or uncontaminated are called that.

original: 'di skad du gzugs med pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas gzugs dang / de'i rnam par shes pa mi srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di skad du gzugs med pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas gzugs dang / de'i rnam par shes pa mi srid pa'i phyir /
translated: This is saying that because they are free from attachment to form, form and its consciousness are impossible in the formless realm.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na lus so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na lus so //
translated: The mental consciousness alone is the body.

original: de yang gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa can la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa de'i tshe /🔽rnam par smin pa nyid med pas /
analyzed: de yang gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa can la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa de'i tshe / rnam par smin pa nyid med pas /
translated: And when it is of the nature of passion, etc.,🔽then it is not a ripened effect.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rdzas med do //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rdzas med do //
translated: Thus there is no substance of a ripened effect.

original: de bas na 'gro ba ni rnam @92b par smin pa ma yin pa dang ldan pa ma yin par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na 'gro ba ni rnam @92b par smin pa ma yin pa dang ldan pa ma yin par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the world would not possess a non-ripened effect.

original: de yang mi 'dod de /
analyzed: de yang mi 'dod de /
translated: But that is unacceptable.

original: de lta bas na rnam par smin pa'i 'gro ba gdags pa'i rgyu rnam par shes pa gzhan zhig gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //🔽'dir yang gang zhig gang yod na /
analyzed: de lta bas na rnam par smin pa'i 'gro ba gdags pa'i rgyu rnam par shes pa gzhan zhig gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no // 'dir yang gang zhig gang yod na /
translated: Therefore, it is taught that another consciousness must be accepted as the cause for the designation of the world as a ripened effect.

original: 'byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa sbyor ba bshad ma thag pa gang yin pa de nyid rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa sbyor ba bshad ma thag pa gang yin pa de nyid rig par bya ste /
translated: Here, too, the application of “when this exists, that occurs” should be understood as it was just explained.

original: 'di ltar gzugs med pa na rnam par smin pa'i 'gro bar gdags pa ni rnam par shes pa gzhan yod na 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs med pa na rnam par smin pa'i 'gro bar gdags pa ni rnam par shes pa gzhan yod na 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus, the designation of the world as a ripened effect occurs when another consciousness exists in the formless realm.

original: skyon 'di yang bye brag tu smra ba pa dag la yod de /
analyzed: skyon 'di yang bye brag tu smra ba pa dag la yod de /
translated: This fault also applies to the Vaibhāṣikas.

original: de dag ni 'gro ba dag ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa nyid yin no zhes rjod par byed do //
analyzed: de dag ni 'gro ba dag ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa nyid yin no zhes rjod par byed do //
translated: They say that the realms are unobscured-neutral.

original: gzhan yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i zhes bya ba gzhan 'di yang brjod dgos so //🔽don ni 'di skad du / srid pa'i rtse mo las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs med pa na ni gal te zhig na rnam par smin pa ma yin pa yang 'gro ba yin par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: gzhan yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i zhes bya ba gzhan 'di yang brjod dgos so // don ni 'di skad du / srid pa'i rtse mo las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs med pa na ni gal te zhig na rnam par smin pa ma yin pa yang 'gro ba yin par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Moreover, this other point should be stated:

original: srid pa'i rtse mo de na ni lan cig phyir mi 'od pa zag pa zad par byed pa rnams ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi zag pa med pa'i sems mngon du gyur pa na /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo de na ni lan cig phyir mi 'od pa zag pa zad par byed pa rnams ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi zag pa med pa'i sems mngon du gyur pa na /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows: If the formless realm were not excluded from the summit of existence, then the realm would be non-karmic maturation, but in the summit of existence, those who bring about the exhaustion of defilements and are non-returners, when the uncontaminated mind of the base of nothingness manifests,

original: de yang mi srid pas 'gro ba chad pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang mi srid pas 'gro ba chad pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: that is impossible. Therefore the realm would be severed.

original: de yang mi 'dod de de bas na 'dir yang sbyor ba snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang mi 'dod de de bas na 'dir yang sbyor ba snga ma bzhin no //
translated: But that is unacceptable. Therefore, the earlier application also applies here.

original: skyon 'di ni spyir rnam par shes pa de khas mi len par gyur pa thams cad la yod do //🔽'dir gal te bye brag tu smra ba pa dag rgol pa gang zhig / sems dang sems las byung ba las ma gtogs pa ldan pa ma yin pa gzhan khas mi len pa de la skyon 'di yod kyi gang zhig rigs mthun pa la sogs pa ldan pa
analyzed: skyon 'di ni spyir rnam par shes pa de khas mi len par gyur pa thams cad la yod do // 'dir gal te bye brag tu smra ba pa dag rgol pa gang zhig / sems dang sems las byung ba las ma gtogs pa ldan pa ma yin pa gzhan khas mi len pa de la skyon 'di yod kyi gang zhig rigs mthun pa la sogs pa ldan pa
translated: This fault exists in general for all who do not assert consciousness.

original: ma yin pa yang yod par khas len pa de la ni thal ba 'dir yang mi 'gyur ro zhes smras na /
analyzed: ma yin pa yang yod par khas len pa de la ni thal ba 'dir yang mi 'gyur ro zhes smras na /
translated: Here, if the Vaibhāṣika opponent says, “This fault exists for those who do not assert any other nonassociated formative factor apart from mind and mental factors, but this consequence does not apply to those who assert that there are nonassociated formative factors such as homogeneity and so on.”

original: de'i phyir pha rol gyi glags bzlog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir pha rol gyi glags bzlog pa'i phyir /
translated: To counter such objections,🔽the root text says, “Homogeneity and so on,”

original: rigs mthun pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rigs mthun pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: ji ltar rigs mthun pa la sogs pa mi srid pa de lta bu ni mdzod kyi bstan bcos las rgya cher bshad zin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar rigs mthun pa la sogs pa mi srid pa de lta bu ni mdzod kyi bstan bcos las rgya cher bshad zin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since it has already been extensively explained in the treatise the Treasury of Abhidharma that homogeneity and so on are impossible,

original: 'dir spro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'dir spro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: it is unnecessary to elaborate on this here.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rigs pas rgya cher rab tu bsgrubs nas mjug bsdu ba mdzad do //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rigs pas rgya cher rab tu bsgrubs nas mjug bsdu ba mdzad do //
translated: Thus and so forth is the conclusion of the extensive proof by reasoning.

original: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snge pa gzhan la rab tu grags pas kyang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa 'grub par ston pa'o //🔽btsun @93a * //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snge pa gzhan la rab tu grags pas kyang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa 'grub par ston pa'o // btsun @93a * //
translated: The words that itself and so forth show that the establishment of the fruitional consciousness is also well known to other schools.

original: pa gos dmar sde ba rnams zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa gnas brtan pa rnams te /
analyzed: pa gos dmar sde ba rnams zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa gnas brtan pa rnams te /
translated: The words the Venerable ones of the Red Robes refer to the noble Sthaviras.

original: de dag ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa kho na la srid pa'i yan lag gi rnam par shes pa'i sgras tha snyad rjod par byed do //🔽gzhan dag na re rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes zer ro zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa dge 'dun phal chen pa rnams te /
analyzed: de dag ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa kho na la srid pa'i yan lag gi rnam par shes pa'i sgras tha snyad rjod par byed do // gzhan dag na re rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes zer ro zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa dge 'dun phal chen pa rnams te /
translated: They use the term consciousness of the members of existence only for the fundamental consciousness.

original: de dag kyang rang gi sde pa dag las rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sgras tha snyad rjod par byed do //
analyzed: de dag kyang rang gi sde pa dag las rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sgras tha snyad rjod par byed do //
translated: Others say root consciousness, and so forth. The noble Mahāsāṃghikas say that the term root consciousness is used in their own school.

original: 'o na de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: 'o na de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: Well then, the words that consciousness and so forth indicate the refutation of the opponent's position.

original: slob dpon la gzhan dag rgol bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: slob dpon la gzhan dag rgol bar byed pa ste /
translated: Others argue with the master.

original: gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa las ma gtogs pa'i kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhan zhig yod na /
analyzed: gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa las ma gtogs pa'i kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhan zhig yod na /
translated: If the foundation consciousness is different from eye consciousness and so on,

original: de'i dmigs pa ci yin pa dang / rnam pa ci yin par brjod dgos te /
analyzed: de'i dmigs pa ci yin pa dang / rnam pa ci yin par brjod dgos te /
translated: then you must explain what its object and aspect are.

original: rnam par shes pa dmigs pa med pa dang / rnam pa med pa ni med do zhes bsams pa'o //🔽dmigs pa dang / rnam pa ma chad pa yin no zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dmigs pa med pa dang / rnam pa med pa ni med do zhes bsams pa'o // dmigs pa dang / rnam pa ma chad pa yin no zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
translated: Consciousness without an object and without an aspect does not exist.

original: slob dpon la lan 'debs par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: slob dpon la lan 'debs par mdzad pa ste /
translated: The master responds:🔽It is not that its object and aspect are not differentiated.🔽This means that it is not the case that its object and aspect are not differentiated.

original: gang la dus thams cad du rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin du ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rjes su dpag pas shes par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gang la dus thams cad du rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin du ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rjes su dpag pas shes par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: It is not the case that its object and aspect are not differentiated because it is always the same in terms of its nature as karmic maturation and because it is to be known by inference.

original: dmigs pa dang / rnam pa 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi gsal ba dang / yongs su mi chod pa dag yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang / rnam pa 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi gsal ba dang / yongs su mi chod pa dag yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not clear and not fully differentiated that its object and aspect are like this.

original: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yang yin la de dang 'dra ba yang yin zhe na zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhan gyis rnam par shes pa 'di 'dra ba mi srid por bstan pa'i phyir smra ba yin no //🔽de ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par shes pa rgyu ba mi gsal ba ni /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yang yin la de dang 'dra ba yang yin zhe na zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhan gyis rnam par shes pa 'di 'dra ba mi srid por bstan pa'i phyir smra ba yin no // de ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam par shes pa rgyu ba mi gsal ba ni /
translated: How is it that it is consciousness and also like that? This is said by the opponent in order to show that such a consciousness is impossible.

original: gzhan gyis kyang khas blangs so zhes bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang khas blangs so zhes bstan to //
translated: The phrase “in the meditative attainment of cessation, etc.” shows that even the opponent accepts that the movement of consciousness is unclear.

original: rnam pa shes pa yod par smra ba gzhan dag dang yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam pa shes pa yod par smra ba gzhan dag dang yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “with other proponents of consciousness” refers to

original: btsun pa dbyig bshes la sogs pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa khas mi len par smra ba dag go //
analyzed: btsun pa dbyig bshes la sogs pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa khas mi len par smra ba dag go //
translated: the Venerable Vasumitra and others who are said not to accept the foundation consciousness.

original: mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni de dang yang brtsad par bya ba 'di mtshungs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni de dang yang brtsad par bya ba 'di mtshungs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase “it is the same” means that the argument is the same for them.

original: 'o na de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba ni gzhan te /
analyzed: 'o na de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba ni gzhan te /
translated: The phrase “but that is not so” and so on is said by the opponent.

original: gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa las ma gtogs pa'i kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhan zhig yod na /
analyzed: gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa las ma gtogs pa'i kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhan zhig yod na /
translated: If there were a store-consciousness different from eye-consciousness, etc.,

original: zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung por bsdus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung por bsdus pa'i phyir /
translated: because all that is impure is included in the appropriating aggregates,🔽in which appropriating aggregate is the store-consciousness included?

original: 'on de gzugs la @93b sogs pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po gang du gtogs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'on de gzugs la @93b sogs pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po gang du gtogs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is: in which material form, etc., appropriating aggregate is it included?🔽The Master shows his understanding:

original: don gyis na rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung por ro zhes bya ba 'dis ni slob dpon gyis rtogs pa ston par mdzad do //🔽don gyis na zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir shugs kyis na /
analyzed: don gyis na rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung por ro zhes bya ba 'dis ni slob dpon gyis rtogs pa ston par mdzad do // don gyis na zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir shugs kyis na /
translated: “In the appropriating aggregate of consciousness” by implication.

original: rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung por gtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung por gtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: By implication means that the store-consciousness is included in the appropriating aggregate of consciousness because it is by nature consciousness.

original: sgras ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgras ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not by the explicit statement of the verse.

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dngos su nye bar len pa'i phung por gtogs par gsungs pa ni med pas so //
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dngos su nye bar len pa'i phung por gtogs par gsungs pa ni med pas so //
translated: The statement that the foundation consciousness is included in the appropriated aggregates is not literally true.

original: 'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan dag lung dang 'gal bar brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan dag lung dang 'gal bar brjod pa yin te /
translated: Others say that this contradicts scripture.

original: gal te kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhan zhig yod na /🔽mdo 'di gnyi ga las kyang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug dag go zhes 'byung ba de dang 'gal lo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gal te kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhan zhig yod na / mdo 'di gnyi ga las kyang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug dag go zhes 'byung ba de dang 'gal lo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: If the foundation consciousness is something other than the sixfold collection of consciousness,

original: dgongs pa can yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: dgongs pa can yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: then this contradicts the statement in both the Samdhinirmocana and the Abhidharmasamuccaya that the sixfold collection of consciousnesses is the foundation consciousness.

original: slob dpon gyis mi 'gal bar ston par mdzad pa'o /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis mi 'gal bar ston par mdzad pa'o /
translated: The master explains that this is not a contradiction.

original: 'di la dgongs pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di la dgongs pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the intention here?

original: zhes zer ba ni gzhan te /
analyzed: zhes zer ba ni gzhan te /
translated: The intention is this:

original: sems pa ni yang srid pa mngon par 'du byed pa zhugs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems pa ni yang srid pa mngon par 'du byed pa zhugs pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is the mind that engages in the formation of manifest action that leads to rebirth,

original: de las de skad ces brjod par ched che ba ni dgongs pa yin na /
analyzed: de las de skad ces brjod par ched che ba ni dgongs pa yin na /
translated: it is the most important of the three mental aggregates, and therefore it is called mind.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug bstan pa 'di la go dgos pa ci zhig yod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug bstan pa 'di la go dgos pa ci zhig yod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: What is the meaning of the teaching of the six collections of consciousness?

original: slob dpon dgongs pa ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: slob dpon dgongs pa ston par mdzad do //
translated: The master [Vasubandhu] explains the intention of the Bhagavān with “The Bhagavān said, etc.”

original: ci'i phyir de ltar rtog par 'gyur zhe na zhes zer ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar rtog par 'gyur zhe na zhes zer ba ni gzhan no //
translated: “Why would one think that?” is the opponent’s position.

original: de'i rnam pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni slob dpon te /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni slob dpon te /
translated: The master [Vasubandhu] says, “Its aspect, etc.”

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam par smin pa rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam par smin pa rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the ālaya consciousness is of a single nature as the result of karmic maturation,

original: 'khor ba ji srid par gzhan du 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: 'khor ba ji srid par gzhan du 'gyur ba med de /
translated: it does not change into something else for as long as cyclic existence continues.

original: des na shin tu phra ba'i phyir de'i rang bzhin khong du ma chud pa rnams /
analyzed: des na shin tu phra ba'i phyir de'i rang bzhin khong du ma chud pa rnams /
translated: Therefore, because it is extremely subtle, those who have not understood its nature

original: gal te na bdag tu yang rtog par 'gyur ro //🔽re zhig mdo las gsungs pa'i dgongs pa gcig ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: gal te na bdag tu yang rtog par 'gyur ro // re zhig mdo las gsungs pa'i dgongs pa gcig ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: might think it is a self.🔽That is one of the intentions of the sūtras.

original: de ni dgongs pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni dgongs pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach another intention, [Vasubandhu] says,

original: gang zhig rten dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang zhig rten dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
